price: E em verdade, se morrerdes ou fordes mortos em combate, a Allah sereis reunidos.
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna
